intro: Borreria shandongensis, commonly known as the Shandong borreria, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes many species of shrubs and herbs. Borreria shandongensis is valued for its ornamental appeal and ecological role in supporting local biodiversity.
